Paris Saint-Germain have not lost any of their last 38 home games against a promoted side in Ligue 1, with their last defeat coming against Montpellier on 15 May 2010.

events.title: Espanyol vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18 - Mini Match
events.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979  and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal  as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979  and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal  as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

events.title: Sevilla vs Levante - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18
events.desc: Sevilla are unbeaten in their last eight LaLiga games against Levante, winning the last four encounters – they have never gone nine league matches without defeat against them in the competition. Sevilla have lost just one of their 16 home LaLiga games against Levante UD, a 2-3 defeat in January 2014. Only against Elche  and Real Murcia  do Sevilla have a lower home defeat percentage  than against Levante UD  – also 6.2% against Cádiz.

events.title: Manchester City vs. Chelsea - English Premier League 2026/2027
events.desc: Each of Cole Palmer’s last nine Premier League goals for Chelsea have been scored in London. He’s not scored outside of the capital since December 2024, while he’s not scored north of London since August 2024. Erling Haaland has scored 11 goals in eight Premier League home games for Man City this season, netting twice in five different games. The last player to score 2+ goals in more different home games in a season was Haaland himself in 2022-23.
